award_title: Collaborative Research: SHF: Small: HexAI: Holistic Exploration for Design Automation of Efficient AI Accelerators
subject: Your students' work in AI hardware design
body:
Hi Jiang,

Labs doing AI accelerator work produce tools that could help dozens of other groupsâ€”but they usually die in a methods section.

Ouro lets you publish computational methods as actual infrastructure. When someone reuses a tool your student built, their name and your lab's connection travel with it. It's a way to make training contributions visible and durable.

Worth a quick chat in January?

Hope you have a good holiday break.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
